title: Calories in a Diet Dr Pepper

h1: Calories in a Diet Dr Pepper
assumptions: Standard 12 fl oz can; zero-calorie, aspartame-sweetened soda; no added flavors or modifications.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, serving size, and formulation; check labels for exact values as recipes can change.

quick_answer.text: A standard 12 oz can of Diet Dr Pepper contains 0 calories.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Switch to regular Dr Pepper (full sugar)
20 fl oz bottle instead of 12 oz can
Add a splash of cream (1 tbsp)

faqs.q: How many calories in a diet dr pepper can?
faqs.a: Zero calories in a standard 12 oz can.

faqs.q: Does diet dr pepper have carbs or sugar?
faqs.a: No carbs or sugars; it's sweetened with artificial sweeteners.

faqs.q: What's the sodium in a diet dr pepper?
Is diet dr pepper really zero calories?
faqs.a: Yes, due to non-nutritive sweeteners like aspartame.

faqs.q: How does diet dr pepper compare to regular?
faqs.a: Diet has 0 kcal vs. ~150 kcal in regular; same flavor, less sugar.
